From: [redacted] @bop.gov] Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 1:57 PM To [redacted] ; [redacted] @usdoj.gov>; [redacted] @usdoj.gov>; [redacted] @usdoj.gov> Subject: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein
